meanings.definition: a plant disease caused by fungi
meanings.sent1: The farmer noticed the anthracnose spreading on his crops.
meanings.sent2: The gardener treated the anthracnose on the rose bushes.
meanings.sent3: The anthracnose seemed to be having a party on the leaves.
meanings.sent4: The anthracnose crept through the garden like a silent invader.
meanings.sent5: The anthracnose turned the plants into a battleground of green and brown.

meanings.definition: a fungal disease affecting plants, especially trees and shrubs
meanings.sent1: The anthracnose caused the trees to lose their leaves prematurely.
meanings.sent2: The horticulturist studied the anthracnose affecting the shrubs.
meanings.sent3: The anthracnose played hide and seek with the plants.
meanings.sent4: The anthracnose was a dark cloud looming over the garden.
meanings.sent5: The anthracnose turned the once vibrant garden into a scene of decay.

meanings.sent1: The anthracnose spread rapidly among the plants in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent2: The biologist researched the origins of anthracnose in the crops.
meanings.sent3: The anthracnose whispered secrets to the other plant diseases.
